channel.title: How much would a pc cost if
channel.description:
I wanted to know, how much it would cost, generally , if a PC had linux, 2gb of ram, Like 50gb hard disk space. And like 2GHz, now if there was anything else involved lemme know. I have a mouse, screen, and a keyboard, keep in mind. However it comes with a screen/mouse/ or keyboard its okay. Don't tell me to google it, I have.
You can either post a link with these specifications or tell me how much it would normally cost.

diamond™:

i bet thats fast as lightning.[/quote]
[Sarcasm] I bet that’s thats the most helpfull post ever. [/Sarcasm]

Read full topic

item.title: How much would a pc cost if
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

I would suggest 2gb’s of memory. and a 200gb hard drive. My laptop runs like a rocket.
i paid around 650$ for it though :U.

Read full topic
item.source: How much would a pc cost if

item.title: How much would a pc cost if
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

I got one with 512mb of ram, 2.2ghz and 160gb HDD for $350. Another 512mb of ram = $25, and another 1gb = $50…So $450-500 tops for a decent computer. You won’t be playing CoD4…but oh well.

Read full topic
item.source: How much would a pc cost if
